== Pernem (626639) ==
      
Pernem is a village in the [[Pernem]] taluka of [[North Goa]] district with an area of 2350.87 hectares and harbouring 629 households with total population of 2701 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[PERNEM]] is at a distance of 3 km. Male population is 1390 and female population is 1311. Scheduled Caste Population is 14 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 626639<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
